name: Bootloader
asm_code:
KERNEL_OFFSET equ {Kernel Address}

mov [BOOT_DRIVE], dl
mov bp, 0x9000
mov sp, bp

call load_kernel
jmp KERNEL_OFFSET

%include "disk.asm"

load_kernel:
    mov bx, KERNEL_OFFSET
    mov dh, {SECTORS}
    mov dl, [BOOT_DRIVE]
    call disk_load
    ret

BOOT_DRIVE db 0

times 510-($-$$) db 0
dw 0xaa55
